item.title: Large-scale System Design
item.description: Since I am a newbie and do not have too much expertise, I will share in the easiest way to understand this topic. Instead of talking about how to build a particular system, I am going to give a general introduction to how to build a large scale system. General methods Handling a large number of requests in one system is like serving multiple customers in a store or an airport.
